channel.title: Sponser today - July 2010 Congratulations MoparIsTheBest!
channel.description:
They made the most ever this month, I was able to have access to sponser list for a while now, over 3 months.
Well, yeah they made over 2.1k USD this month! Suprised people aren't developing servers for the money.
Anyways here's a picture. [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/nwzrsk.png[/img]
Congratulations MoparIsTheBest!
From, Pouch

item.title: Sponser today - July 2010 Congratulations MoparIsTheBest!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:20, topic:348316”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=444696.msg3265978#msg3265978 date=1278871389]

[quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=444696.msg3265967#msg3265967 date=1278870890]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=444696.msg3265960#msg3265960 date=1278870406]

Just wait for someone to report the paypal account to Jagex…

You’re retarded. Its an advertising service that people just happen to use for RSPS. In no way could JaGEx do anything about that money…
[/quote]You’re retarded. https://cms.paypal.com/us/cgi-bin/?&cmd=_render-content&content_ID=ua/AcceptableUse_full
Read #2 (f)

I don’t see anything about advertising.
[/quote]Seeing as how anything related to back-engineering the client violates trademark (this site got off the hook because the ‘members’ are doing it, while the site itself does not) I think JaGex might see differently and petition PayPal.

  1. It’s called reverse engineering…
  2. All the money in that account is from advertising, not supporting reverse-engineering. I mean its the same as people who buy bots. JaGEx can’t have their account suspended because they spent it on botting.
    [/quote]The could suspend the bot makers account though…

Technically yes. But mitb isnt the one making servers, now is he? He’s just buying them.[/quote]In which case he is buying ‘stolen property’.

Ever heard of RuneL?

Read full topic

item.title: Sponser today - July 2010 Congratulations MoparIsTheBest!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Analogy for my friend Davidi2:

Moparisthebest is providing billboard space for a drug dealer so that he has better business. He is not providing drugs to him for better business. There’s a difference. Moparisthebest could be completely unaware of their use of advertisement. They just coincidentally use his service for private servers. All in all, it’s a lot less radical than drugs.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponser today - July 2010 Congratulations MoparIsTheBest!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:348316”][quote author=spy man47 link=topic=444696.msg3264977#msg3264977 date=1278802001]
Holy shit… 3.8k?!?
[/quote]Yea, but that’s not counting the money he gets from Google ads. (And those come to him in bank check form…)[/quote]
Google adsense really doesn’t get him alot. Iirc he once said that adsense is barely enough to cover the costs of maintaining the site. And that was quite a while ago.

[quote=“Newty, post:6, topic:348316”]He only gets the money from the top 10 I believe.

Also, the money doesn’t go to him, it is deposited in a bank account to be spent towards the progression of RSPS.[/quote]
Actually it sits in a Paypal account that is dedicated to the sponsored server fund.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponser today - July 2010 Congratulations MoparIsTheBest!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:6, topic:348316”]He only gets the money from the top 10 I believe.

Also, the money doesn’t go to him, it is deposited in a bank account to be spent towards the progression of RSPS.[/quote]Guess who’s bank account it is? And yes, I only counted the top 10 people. ~3800 was what it came to.

[quote=“jmood128, post:7, topic:348316”][quote author=Newty link=topic=444696.msg3265060#msg3265060 date=1278805033]
He only gets the money from the top 10 I believe.

Also, the money doesn’t go to him, it is deposited in a bank account to be spent towards the progression of RSPS.
[/quote]

How many servers have been released that fit the specifications for the $100.[/quote]Have there been any? And even then, if you count the over 2000 dollars a month he’s bringing in (just sponsored servers, not ads), has any been spent to ‘progress’ RSPS? If so, that would be awesome to see.

But I honestly don’t see why MITB has the ads on the site, it’s not like he’s not bringing in any money from the sponsored page…

Read full topic
